column5: I can relate; I find myself thinking this a lot.
I'm definitely guilty of going off on tangents in my mind when my FP doesn't reply right away so thank you for this.
Is this how everyone feels about people with bpd?
He's the fucking best person ever. I love riding with him :)
Please don't. You are valued. You are loved.

I NEEDED to see this today. 
Thank you.
I'm sorry but your username is fantastic.
